name: Vint Cerf
thesis_title: Multiprocessors, Semaphores, and a Graph Model of Computation
prizes: IEEE Alexander Graham Bell Medal  (1997) , National Medal of Technology  (1997) , Marconi Prize small, Prince of Asturias Award  (2002) , Turing Award  (2004) , Presidential Medal of Freedom  (2005) , Japan Prize  (2008) , Harold Pender Award  (2010) , Queen Elizabeth Prize for Engineering  (2013)
